name: MusicalGames-MusicalChairs&FreezeDancers
0:
”Alexa, open Musical Games.”
”Alexa, ask Musical Games to play Musical Chairs.”
”Alexa, ask Musical Games to play Musical Bumps.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical games
des:
Musical Chairs, Freeze Dancers, Musical Bumps and More!

Bored? This compendium of active and super fun family games will keep everyone entertained for hours. Dance and sing to catchy tunes and throw your best shapes. Go on, go crazy! 

Musical games currently available include:

Musical Chairs (Trip to Jerusalem)
Freeze Dancers (Musical Statues)
Musical Bumps (We All Fall Down)

Games coming soon include:

Animal Dancers
If You're Happy and You Know It
Copy Clap
Name the Instrument
Spin The Microphone
Dizzy Dancers
Musical Clothes
Hot Potato
Pass The Parcel
Ring Around The Rosie

Dance, hop, clap, walk, crawl, jump, sing and shout to lots of different music tracks. 

If you love Musical Games, please let us know!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
